title: Great Deals!
text: I was skeptical about dealing with a new internet seller but they had a deal on cool Lenovo Bluetooth earbuds that was beyond insane (89 cents, seriously?!) and they arrived promptly, looked and worked great, same model as advertised. Then I roamed around the site and found several more crazy deals in a matter of minutes. Again, everything was as advertised, and so cheap I couldn‚Äôt believe they could ship the stuff for free. Now I‚Äôm addicted to them, I‚Äôm on order five or six already. The shipping is not like Prime, so be prepared to wait a bit, but so far nothing has taken more than about ten days. I just did a refund request on two items and was given instant credit, so customer service is fast and legit. They ship everything in orange plastic bags, but so far it hasn‚Äôt been a problem.

title: Addictive
text: I am addicted to buying off Temu. The prices are great and to hard to pass up. I love the extra discounts I get and coupons they send me. The biggest compliment I have is how they ship items. I have had several items come in damaged and had to get refunded. I hate when They send merchandise in the bags instead of boxes. But even when it‚Äôs sent in boxes the packing isn‚Äôt the best and things come in damage. That being said their return procedure very easy to do. The prices are unbelievable. And I love that they give you a price adjustment if the price goes down after you buy. However you have to check your orders daily to see if a price adjustment is available and you have to request it because it is not automatic. I will keep buying for sure because like I said I am addicted haha.

title: Thought Temu was a scam‚Ä¶.
text:
When I saw the advertisements for Temu I though it was a scam site until my friend had the cutest ring on and I asked her where she got it from and she said‚Ä¶that site ‚ÄúTemu‚Äù. I thought I would check it out!!! 
Then I thought yeah it‚Äôll be like the Wish thing where you had to wait ages and get crappy stuff. So I ordered 2 pair of earrings first to see what I got. To my surprise they were gorgeous!!!!! And.. they came so fast!!! 
Fast forward and hundreds of dollars later and tons of items‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm hooked!!! The only item that was ‚Äú bad‚Äù which really wasn‚Äôt bad was a tshirt that had a hole under the arm, a manufacturer defect. Of which Temu would‚Äôve taken care of but I just sewed it. I love it, my grandkids love the little fake tattoos I buy them and all the fun stuff and it doesn‚Äôt break the bank!!!

title: The big prizes & prices you Just can‚Äôt beat
text:

Until it takes over you phone text & emails none stop.. the IT COSMETICS wad A knock off to liquidity & extensions of hair is so cheap since it‚Äôs not real hair! They‚Äôre too liquidy & extensions of hair is so cheap since it‚Äôs not real . Shipping is fast but when the boxes are crammed in a tiny box, pop, sockets won‚Äôt stick & crumpled , your personal information is taken..I can‚Äôt I‚Äôm Unsubscribe DONT DOWNLOAD

title: Always changing
text:
I rated this a one star until I actually receive a prize. The rules gradually change to give you fewer rewards as you get closer to the goal. There‚Äôs a complete lack of transparency and integrity to the rules. They constantly remove ways to gain ‚Äúwater‚Äù or ‚Äúfish food‚Äù etc, while giving you less progress for it. Unless you have dozens of people who have never played before and download the app for the first time, you‚Äôre out of luck. I understand that it shouldn‚Äôt be easy to get the rewards, but they also do not allow you to ‚Äúpay the difference‚Äù. You either win it all, or get nothing and have to pay full price. Not only that, but of course the merchandise is largely low quality and not worth the money they want to charge for it. 

I did purchase some of the products to test their quality and have been unimpressed. I was trying to win some others to try because I wouldn‚Äôt pay for them again. The company has no honor. And you will have no luck trying to win.

title: It‚Äôs official. I‚Äôm addicted.
text: I always make sure to purchase products that have great reviews and that also have pictures along with them. So far my experience with this app is phenomenal. The shipping is completely bearable for the price and quality of everything they offer. I have a hard time purchasing from anywhere else if I see that this app carries something comparable. I‚Äôm pretty sure this app will be my downfall, but it‚Äôs OK. More bang for your buck! I also enjoy the little games that you can play, and all the offers and credits that you can win. This app is just all-around fun. I sometimes spend hours on this app and I don‚Äôt realize it until I look at the time. But I suppose it‚Äôs better than spending time looking over things that put me out of hundreds of dollars LOL.

title: Lives up to the Positive Reviews!
text:
I just happened to be scrolling online and saw an advertisement for Temu. I have become addicted. There are so many cute, nifty, and trendy items! I do wish there was an option to ‚ù§Ô∏è an item to go on a loved items list instead of having to go through the browsing history.

That being said, I want to give more positive feedback to Temu. I contacted customer support to provide feedback for the loved item list, and they were quick to respond. They‚Äôre working on that feature and hopefully coming out with it soon on a future app update. If you have any questions or an issue, they‚Äôre great about responding in an appropriate manner of time. Keep it up! I‚Äôm impressed and have already spread the good word about this app to lots of friends and coworkers.

title: Very pleased with this company
text: I was sort of skeptical at first, but my daughter kept insisting I try it she had been ordering for a while until we have how me was and the quality was superb. Also, customer service was real over-the-top so I thought OK I had an ordered from another country in years since I had a bad experience with one that started with a W that‚Äôs all I‚Äôm gonna say so after my first order from Temu, I was so impressed, if I could give them 10 stars, I would exceptional customer service, fast, fast shipping and the quality I‚Äôm amazed at,I don‚Äôt know how many orders I placed since I heard of Temu, but I know it won‚Äôt be the last love their selection, the price and you get rid of the middleman. I think that pretty much sums it up. Thank you temu . It made me a true believer again. Susie.ü•∞

title: Pretty Good!
text: So, you can definitely get free things from this app. You‚Äôll have to invite three NEW people to the app and then they will have to make an account (or just send the link to a different device of yours and cheats the system) after that then you can get for sure three gifts, but some other people have been offered more than three. I personally received and cashed out the 3 gift option. Some of the gifts are a little weird, but there are certain ones that are worth 20$ plus however much the other gifts are. I‚Äôd say a pretty good deal! On my first day I got the three free gifts and also 20$ worth of credits. The games are rigged but there are still ways to win, which is understandable because they still need to make money. Overall I‚Äôm having fun trying to get friends and family to download the app ‚Äî it‚Äôs like some sick gamble.

title: Wow!!
text: I was very scared to order from this company because of such a bad experience with Wish, I placed an order of near 80/90 dollars of stocking stuffers, not expecting top of the line items so cheap but I was really pleasantly surprised at the stuff I received! A lot of it I‚Äôve bought from our go to overnight company but for so much more money!! The thing is ? shop!! Read descriptions and maybe a few reviews as they are a bit mixed up. All I can say is I waited 2 short weeks hoping for the best, after I received it? I ordered 2 more times well over a hundred both times! Shipping was quick 2 weeks and free if you spend something lol.. all in all ? With a good eye some patience,and time too look? The products I received are great, and it didn‚Äôt take 6 to 10 weeks.. I‚Äôll be ordering again!

title: Great Products and Great after Sales Service.
text:
In the beginning i was reluctant to buy goods from Temu thinking my money may go in waste, so i purchased 2 items just to try out, but the items came before expected time and in good packing, when i opened my package, the items were in very good condition and usage wise they worked amazingly.
Since that day , I‚Äôm in love with Temu. Above all when you go on their website, there is a whole new world opened for you, you just have to type the name of an item and it pops up with so many choices, even you imagine something and they have it at a very reasonable price besides, their customer service after sales too is excellent for genuine cases.
Overall i really very happy with Temu comparing with other online sale platforms.

title: Will never shop there again!
text:
So I was told Temu was like Wish, but you get your orders quicker.  I used to really like Wish so I decided to try it.  I found the products like Wish but a little more expensive, not a big deal.  I placed a large order over $100, and when it arrived 1 item was missing.  The item cost $4 it wasn‚Äôt a big deal, but I wanted a refund for the missing item.  
It took forever to figure out how to contact customer service to report a missing item.  They don‚Äôt make that easy to find at all, and there customer service is fully automated so you can‚Äôt speak to anyone.  Finally reported the item missing.  Had to take a picture of my order!  And a few days later my refund was still denied!  Because they claim they sent it! Like I would lie about not getting a $4 squeegee, out of a $140 order. Terrible customer support.  I learned my lesson about Temu.  I‚Äôm not getting stuck for a more expensive item in the future that they might not send, so I‚Äôm never ordering from them again!

title: Overall great
text:
I do love the app and item selection, had zero issues with product ordered, and shipping time is reasonable for most items, 
I have only 2 complaints/suggestions:
1st, (and I assume this is supposed to cut on shipping cost) the fact that almost everything comes wrapped only in Temu branded bags, I personally feel packaging could be a bit sturdier, while nothing I‚Äôve received has been damaged beyond use, product poxes have come to me crushed in transit.
2nd, an option to reduce promotional emails, while I enjoy the discounts and notification of sale items in my cart, your themed promotions are a little much, I neglected to log into Temu for 24 hours and have 70+ email notifications in 1 day. please consider limiting the number of emails or at least giving us the option to select how frequently we are notified.

title: Temu and it‚Äôs ups and downs
text: I personally think that temu is a great app to use when you are trying to save money. Ofc, temu has its cons and pros but it mostly has very good deals and offers. Some examples of cons is that the shipping isn‚Äôt always settled and can take more days than wanted for a package to arrive. It can also charge extra money if not careful. But, the pros of temu is that you can actually win free stuff!! If you search free items it will show you a page in which it has a long list of free items. You may only choose five and in order to claim the free item you will be given a time limit in which you have to get the money to zero by then. You can also win money in PayPal which is AWSOME!!!! And, you can play games and win money for example, fish farm. All in all, temu is a great app!!

title: Great place to shop for just about anything!
text:
When I first got Temu I thought it was way to good to be true, but I have been pleasantly surprised by the quality of the things I‚Äôve received especially considering the price. Although it may not be stuff with the best quality out there, like I said for the price it‚Äôs great. Plus the free shipping. Its pretty similar to SHEIN but I would say the price is probably 
a little lower on Temu and the quality of the items just seem to last longer, at least the things I‚Äôm purchasing. I would definitely recommend if your looking for just about anything from room, decor, to clothing, etc. for pretty cheap. I also forgot to mention the great customer service which you don‚Äôt find on many online services anymore. 100% recommend.

title: I absolutely LOVE THIS !
text:
I love shopping with this app so much I think I have become addicted! Ok not thinking‚Ä¶ I am definitely addicted to the incredible prices, the incredible customer service and the incredible merchandise. Just make sure you read the description, check the reviews especially if there are pictures. You will quickly see the awesome shops to click follow. Ok!! I have to get back to SHOPPPINGGG NOW!!! TEMU IS AMAZING!!!

title: I am over the moon happy with Temu!
text:
I was skeptical
About ordering the forest time. And the prices? I thought yeah right, it will be a bunch of junk. I couldn't have been more wrong. In general, I have found the quality to be superb for the price paid. Many of the items I have received are identical to those I have previously purchased in big box craft stores or other department stores. Be cautious, but have fun ordering. Watch the sizes and quantity in what you order. Most items will have sizes shown in o r of the pictures provided. Scroll though all the pictures. With careful review you will receive some great things at bargain prices. And shipping? I haven't had to wait more than 10 days for any of my others and I have placed several. I'm a fan. Thank you for your wonderful site.

title: Don‚Äôt Fall For It
text: This is nothing more than your average ‚Äúrefer your friends‚Äù app that entices you to do so by promising free gifts in return. Only, you have to have several friends sign up and even then you‚Äôll end up ‚Äúalmost there‚Äù over and over. Then your time limit is up and suddenly you have to start all over, inviting more people and stuck in a cycle of never actually winning the free prizes promised. I can‚Äôt speak for the quality of the products, but I can speak to the pricing. Most of the stuff I found was actually higher priced than what I could just got to my local store to get when looking at price per item. And, I could have that stuff right away without the need to wait on it to be shipped. It‚Äôs 2023 and people need to make money, but only you can decide if you‚Äôre going to let them make their money fairly or whether you‚Äôre going to let them use questionable business practices, scammy referral systems, and a bunch of material stuff most of us don‚Äôt need cluttering up our homes anyway.

title: It‚Äôs a pretty good app!
text: Here‚Äôs my honest review. They have good deals, but don‚Äôt waste too much time on the ‚Äúwin free things‚Äù type games. Fishland and farmland give free stuff, but unless you know a lot of people, you‚Äôll never win the other games. I‚Äôve gotten free stuff from my farmland and fishland before. They really have a lot to offer in terms of buyable products. Good deals too. Make sure to wait until a type of holiday to buy stuff, and do the order through fishland or farmland to get free extra feed with your purchase. It‚Äôs a good app. But temu me and u have beef because I was close to win something and my friend didn‚Äôt count for the 5 free gifts, even though it was his first account, and first time installing and hearing about it. Very mad at you about that. Other then that we good.

title: Love Temu but don‚Äôt recommend the games
text: Temu is great they have great stuff for awesome prices but I don‚Äôt recommend playing playing the fish land or farmland I‚Äôve won 1 thing from each and that was just an extra but to get the prizes I picked it‚Äôs taking forever and the time keeps getting longer like please don‚Äôt tell me it‚Äôs going to take me 70 days to finally win on fishland or 165 days to win on farmland and the longer you get on it the less good or water you get and the less it goes it‚Äôs like making it impossible to win for every 10g or food or water you go up 1% on fishland I‚Äôm stuck at 0.06 cents like I‚Äôm almost there but it took me 2 weeks to finish feeding 1 fish and it only took 2 cents off.. I just wish Temu would fix that and be a little lenient with the games..

title: For developer
text: I‚Äôm satisfy with the products, promotions and free items. But there is 2 things that are holding many people back. 1 the app uses the same style that scammers use here in the USA so people don‚Äôt trust and will not even accept the invites. If you can change the style at-least for the invitation so that it doesn‚Äôt look like a scam. 2 please remove the sad or begging emoji from the link because many people will not share a link that starts with a begging message (ü•∫please) that is not something most people would like to share. I‚Äôm very please with Temu, earned 15 gift and enjoyed many great discounts. Most products have meet my speciations and would love to expand my sharing. I hope this feedback is appreciated and taken into consideration. Thanks for the great App and products!

title: I feel Temu force us too much
text:
Hello 
My name is Sonia
And I am an avid buyer in Temu you can check my account. I love Temu and I have spread the voice to everyone who ask and even those who doesn‚Äôt. But I feel like for example in the games that the app has, in order for us to be able to win free products You are forcing us to get others hooked up! Its just makes it so difficult for us to even win one time. I even saw that you kind of trick us into believing we will actually win anything. Yeah I know people have win things but its just like trying to go up a steep hill! I cant force people into getting the app. And some of my contact have told me to stop sending them requests! I will continue to buy from Temu but I wont force people into getting the app! I love the app and all of its products but I wont force no one! I feel shame in doing so its like almost putting a knife on people‚Äôs throat üòÖ

title: Don‚Äôt plan on any of the free stuff as it advertises
text: What‚Äôs annoying about it is that it gets you all excited that you get stuff free then you have to invite people not too bad but then the amount it takes away gets lower as you pass. If the person that you invited already has it then it‚Äôs 2 then 1 then .10 and then who knows. And if they are new it‚Äôs 4 and then 2 etc. making it nearly impossible or super annoying to get it. And they do this without actually telling you that they are reducing it until you realize it yourself. Sure there‚Äôs some stuff that you can get for really cheap in there I did put those two stars for that but then if you get stuff and the total is below 10 then it makes you get more stuff until it‚Äôs above. Again ANNOYING if you want to buy stuff then ig it‚Äôs a decent place to get them but if you‚Äôre planning on getting stuff for free or anything I‚Äôm sorry for you wanting to go through that.

title: Love it
text: I have bought make up skin products kitchen ware house supplies clothes wallets pet supplies everything but shoes right now and have not been disappointed once. Everything comes in in a very timely manner usually always within 10 days but never past the latest date given. Some ackages have been partially damaged but the product never even had a tear or scratch on it which the package gets thrown away regardless. Everything is within budget and a lot of things are better quality than what you pay. Always have discounts and promotions going on. When it says you get a free item you get a free item and don‚Äôt even have to pay for the shipping for it. Which I love and always great quality. I choose Temu over other apps since I started using it.

title: Shady
text:
While if you want a site to get cheap stuff like wish it‚Äôs great, and they‚Äôd get more stars if that‚Äôs all they did. However they also have mini games to get free stuff. To get free stuff you need to invite people. While at the beginning it seems like an easy little game to get some cheap items, it turns into hours of work and in some of the games it takes days and every person you get to sign up gives you less and less of a reward but they‚Äôll still show you as so close because the creators have no sense of how percentages work. 
I‚Äôve seen more than a few people get addicted and spend their time just mindlessly clicking away at these games, ordering things they don‚Äôt need to make more items they don‚Äôt need free, only to have to start the whole thing over because they didn‚Äôt do enough for their free items, despite being at 99% for hours and playing all day doing whatever the game tells them to. 

Just stay away if you or anyone you know has gambling issues.

title: Happy shopper
text:
I was looking for window film I bought years ago from eB** .. i couldn‚Äôt believe the increase in price. Would of coast $50 so I did a Google search and Temu came up for $20 total for the amount I needed. I researched the site and paid with PayPal. I‚Äôm very excited to find Temu. 
 I used to by straight from China off eB** but the prices & shipping have been outrageous. Big increase since the pandemic. Than I bought from Am***n free shipping but triple the cost for the same items.  Returns are a breeze if for some reason you have to return. 
One thing is you have to be very careful of size. They put the measurements on just about everything. I check it with a ruler now. Some things were much smaller than I pictured in my head with the measurements. But that happened on other sites too.

title: It‚Äôs not as bad as people think

title: TEMU VS The world!!
text: It‚Äôs very important to myself and my family to think of more cost effective ways to make it through each day. TEMU has blessed us with that particular ability. I‚Äôve been buying ONLY higher end clothing for several years now and it‚Äôs truly getting too expensive for just about everything‚Ä¶.except for TEMU. TEMU has the name brand without the labels. I was completely shook when I got my first big order. The clothes fit and some actually felt better than some of my higher end clothes that I‚Äôve been wearing. We‚Äôre talking Ralph Lauren, Nike, Reebok, Adidas, Solomon, etc etc‚Ä¶.If you need just about anything, you can get it here at TEMU. And no I‚Äôm not sponsored by the company. I just really enjoy looking at all the great stuff they carry. Thanks for everything TEMU!! You guys are awesome!!

title: I like to shopping at Temu but there are room to improve
text: It‚Äôs totally shocking to see Temu‚Äôs various products and reasonable prices, which are so attractive, especially at the annual holiday shopping season. Also the free shipping, free return policies are encouraging indeed. And, the return process is very effective. Frankly, most of products sold at Temu are nice and in good quality, but few electric ones do not work, and some products are poorly made (not quite meet the basic standard of products for sale in the market) Also, since Temu use only plastic bags to deliver, some stuff arrived with flattened or broken boxes. As customers, looking at those broken boxes easily feel disappointed even before checking out the products themselves. Agree? Really looking forward to seeing Temu continue improving and making more progress in business! Happy New Year!

title: Too much trickery and bait and switch
text:
The app is like AliExpress which also offers lots of cheap products. But seems like it has a faster shipping so I decided to give it a chance. 

Here‚Äôs the problem though: I just want to shop but the app constantly showered me with pop ups and upsell which is super annoying. No, I don‚Äôt want to click 3 times to exit a search flow or spin a stupid wheel to earn ‚Äúcoupons‚Äù. But here‚Äôs the most annoying thing that warrant this 1-star review. A lot of the so called ‚Äúoffers‚Äù from the app were fake offers trying to get you to buy more or capture your data. For example, 1 offer was ‚Äúfree item for new user‚Äù so it asks you to pick an item. But after doing so, you are required to buy/select 6 more items at cost to get the 1 free. So it‚Äôs not really free. Another offer has you earn $200 coupon by picking 2 items, but I am sure there are addition stipulation on the coupon. It‚Äôs these kind of trickery that turn me off and I will not be using it again.

title: Pouch is exactly what men need
text: Wish it came in shorter length in spandex and/or cotton. Love to wear that at the gym. Women‚Äôs yoga attire leaves little to the imagination these days at the gym. Need spandex with built in pouch as well. I‚Äôm 6ft and 178lbs.  Ordered a Large.  Could have gone medium.  Pouch would have fit a bit better as there is more than enough room to accommodate my bulge.  I‚Äôm 5 1/2 flacid and 7 1/2 hard so I think I would have been a bit more snug going a smaller size. My waist is 35 inches and it could be a bit more snug there too.  Funny, they make women‚Äôs underwear as well as some outerwear to conform to the shape of their bulges yet a man‚Äôs bulge is hidden and smashed and ends up rubbing and chaffing. Imagine having women wear some kind of corset which would smash their boobs flat. I‚Äôm all for pouches.  This item is a good start.

title: Problem in returning items.
text: I looked over my order, and I‚Äôve tapped on my order number, but cannot find place to return, and request a return for these items. I am very disappointed in this problem, and even the items I received so disappointed, they are not as pictured they were meant to be gifts, and now I have nothing to give them today. I am so so disappointed I will not order dresses from you ever again maybe children‚Äôs clothes I‚Äôll try, but never will. I order a dress as they are not what they are pictured. Very very disappointed and I will let all my friends know about this.  I did like the jersey shirts and the aprons I received in another order, and will be using them for the event coming up. I have another order coming in. To put in another order I am holding off until the third order is received. Again I need to return and receive refund or I a replacement that is as pictured flared dresses, NOT substitute a-line dresses

title: nintendo switch promotion is a scam
text:
The promotion starts at 10pm EST. I legit opened the app and went to the promotional page minutes before hand and waited, periodically refreshing it. When the count down ended, within the second i clicked on the add to cart button and then a second later it said it was sold out. This is a scam, no way they sold out all that they had in stock. I have yet to see a real verified person say they got a nintendo switch from temu. I have a screen recording of this and it shows how misleading and crooked this is. They flat out lied. And they don‚Äôt provide information on how many they have in stock or the rules of the promotion, unlike any other legitimate business promotion. I‚Äôll be filling again this.

update: i tried again today and as soon as the switch was ‚Äúavailable‚Äù to my cart i got bombarded with notifications and promotions from the app that prevented me from putting it in my cart. Also on instagram it‚Äôs advertised as only being $0.99 but in the app it‚Äôs $7‚Ä¶. A SCAM!!

title: Surprised
text: Tried this App after seeing an advertisement. I don‚Äôt usually use such advertised things, I normally just browse. This site had a lot of interesting things that I legitimately wanted to try out but never had the cash to do so. The prices were great, the shipping was only 7 days with tracking too, and I actually like all the items. My husband was so into what I got that he also downloaded the app and spent an hour on it browsing already.  I was skeptical about the site as the prices were too good to be true and I saw what negative comments others had to say on different sites. But so far my first order is a hit out of the ballpark. Definitely looking for other items we‚Äôve never been able to purchase before. Returning and happy customer!

title: My little secret
text:
I had serious doubts about Temu.
I watched it for a year, then listen to people talk about it. One day I was offered a free item. That‚Äôs what made me sign up for Temu.
Needless to say, I did not get the free gift because I waited too long to purchase the items that I picked out because I was afraid that my card would get hacked so when I finally decided to do it, I was amazed at how fast the merchandise came I was amazed with the quality and I‚Äôm also amazed by the price points I highly recommend Temu. I love playing the games on Temu. I just have trouble inviting guest to get my free gifts due to people being so fickle. 
I have purchased several times well over $100 almost every time and I will continue. I don‚Äôt even shop in the regular stores anymore. Thank you, Tia.

title: Ten out of ten so far
text: So as usually very skeptical of these types of apps ‚Ä¶ but I figured I‚Äôd poke around and find out . And first I‚Äôll say a wide variety of everything you can find and at a very reasonable price very reasonable‚Ä¶. I broke down and got an order and everything went well‚Ä¶ only thing the items were one day late on delivery no big deal and immediately the next day I get a 5 dollar credit was like ok respect‚Ä¶ used that and with another ten dollars of my own money and got over 2000 legos a sprinkler some hydroponic cups a sling shot and ball bearings ha all for ten dollars with the 5 dollar credit and items all delivered two days early and the tracking is honest and trustworthy all in all I give TEMU the big 10/10 and will be placing my next order within the hour ‚Ä¶

title: Annoyed
text: When I downloaded Temu it gave me a chance to get four free items using energy. I had enough energy for all but one item, and in order to get any of the items all of them need claimed first. No big deal right? However, to get more energy you need to invite people to download the app. I did this but each invite offered less and less energy. From 0.5 down to 0.1 making it impossible to get the required energy to claim the free products before the time limit ran out. I went from being a few energy away to being 0.3 energy away and have nobody else to invite to get the last energy. My mother experienced the same thing and said that it was super irritating as it‚Äôs essentially a huge waste of time for not only us but the people invited as well. They should offer other ways to get needed energy or at least make each accepted invite worth the same amount. Extremely annoying being so close yet not able to reach it because they rigged it that way.

title: Definitely worth trying out.
text: I had a fantastic experience with Temu, the online store. The website is user-friendly, and the ordering process was seamless. The variety of products is impressive, and my order usually arrived promptly. The quality of the items exceeded my expectations. Overall, I highly recommend Temu for a smooth and satisfying online shopping experience. Temu's customer service truly shines when it comes to addressing shipment issues. I experienced a delayed delivery, and obtaining a refund was remarkably easy. Their responsive support team promptly addressed my concerns, ensuring a hassle-free process. I appreciate the transparency and efficiency in handling situations where shipments are late or don't arrive. Temu's commitment to customer satisfaction makes them stand out.

title: Offers
text:
The first offer I was given was the buy 3 get 5 free. I was surprised they were even able to get me 5 things for free, of course the 5 things had to be the cheapest in your cart but overall I was able to pick them. I still don‚Äôt get my things shipped so I can‚Äôt review on that. 
Second, I went to their other offers of winning money, and it was all based off of inviting friends

I hated the fact that I just needed 1 diamond to get $100, and they just kept on cutting the 1 diamond into parts. (Even if the minimum of diamonds you could win would be 1 whole diamond) I feel it‚Äôs unfair that they won‚Äôt give you the ‚Äúfree‚Äù money because all they are seeking is to have more users install the app without giving anything in exchange.

In that game called Lucky flip, you are given 4 or 5 chances to flip a card and they will give you close to the amount of diamonds needed to get to your goal. Mine was 500 diamonds to get $100. When I got to 499 diamonds, the next person I‚Äôd invite would be the last one to get 1 diamond. But, instead, they gave me .5 diamonds. 

Don‚Äôt waste your time in those ‚Äúfree‚Äù money and things.  I assume it‚Äôs the same for everything, they tell you to invite, but they won‚Äôt give you anything anyways. 
That‚Äôs why i have  3 stars because I wasted a lot of my time without gaining anything.

title: To love temu
text:
Temu makes it easy to get free prizes for referring friends to the app however if u play fishland game to get free items beware . I am at 7 cents left to get all 4 of my items for free and I have went through 600g of food and still haven‚Äôt been able to raise one fish and that‚Äôs pretty annoying seeing as how they get u all the way to 7 cents to go and u don‚Äôt move fore week plus‚Ä¶. 

At this point I‚Äôm not sure about the fish land and referring. But whenever I make a purchase I‚Äôm always happy with the product and the price as far as trying to get free stuff I have received a few free items from Temu . It‚Äôs not impossible but it‚Äôs rare!

Overall I love Temu and the products u can get great discounts on things ppl pay hundreds for and it‚Äôs the same product !

title: Every Bad review isn‚Äôt true. I AM A REAL USER
text: I have been using Temu for a long time, I‚Äôve never been scammed, my package has always arrived in the correct address, it has never ‚Äústolen my info‚Äù how do you even know they stole it? üôÑ There is no notification or something that says ‚ÄúTEMU STOLE YOUR INFO HAHA‚Äù Like, it doesn‚Äôt steal it. They are just paranoid, and for the freebie games, you don‚Äôt have to play it if you don‚Äôt want to, and for all the people saying ‚ÄúoH tHe FrEeBiE gAmEs aRe tO hArD‚Äù I can reply to that with only 2 words: skill issue. Temu is amazing and all their things are way higher quality than I expected, buying back to school stuff with Temu. They arrived, and I love them a lot. Don‚Äôt listen to the hate reviews. This app is amazing and saved sm of me and my grandmas money. Highly Recommend. üòÅ

title: READ PRODUCT REVIEWS!!!
text: This app is awesome, but only if you do your homework!!! KNOW YOUR MEASUREMENTS! Your REAL ones‚Ä¶ not what you wish you were or what you think you‚Äôll be if you just lose 10 more pounds‚Ä¶ believe me I get it. Just don‚Äôt be too disappointed when things come and ya can‚Äôt quite squeeze in bc you didn‚Äôt keep it a buck w yourself! Aside from measurements, ALWAYS READ THE REVIEWS (and pay special attention to the reviews w ppl IN the clothes, not pics of the product still packaged). Look for reviews from ppl that are generally your measurements and see what they say. Read as many as relate to you and use your judgment. For example, I am a solid medium. In real life. If I‚Äôm ordering a bodycon type dress or outfit I‚Äôm sizing up to large ‚Äòer time. If you do these things you can‚Äôt go wrong w Temu.

title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME‚ÄºÔ∏è
text: Their free games are just NONSENSE. They make it sound like you are getting such a big deal and make it like it‚Äôs legit, but I‚Äôve tried every single game and they are so sneaky with their tactics and I‚Äôve caught on, fish land takes you daysss and they just make you WASTE YOUR TIME by lowering the amount of coins you get when you get closer to finishing and getting your prizes and when I was so close to finishing with only 8 cents left they changed it to 78 cents and I tried again to get as low as possible thinking they aren‚Äôt dumb enough to do again but they did, they do this with all the free games until the only option is to just buy it, and most of their products are LOW QUALITY and BREAK REALLY EASY for me, all this and I heard they most likely do FORCED LABOR!! title: Extremely happy with price & quality!!!!
text:
Let me first explain, that I don‚Äôt order and much less provide payment information unless I check out reviews and complaints of a website and their products. 

I am glad to share every Item I have received has been of quality and true to description. I see often negative reviews because people don‚Äôt take the time to read carefully the descriptions. I love these wall decals. They have been better than expected and the prices are amazing. Just read carefully and be fair in providing negative reviews when buyer is not attentive to details! Great quality, price and delivery!! I will continue to shop for many items I was getting locally. The quality alone is worth a few days in the delivery process!

title: I love Temu.
text: I have been buying from Temu since April. Almost everything that I have received really impressed me with its quality. I used to order from Wish but kept getting things that looked nothing like the picture, we‚Äôre poor quality, we‚Äôre a thin shiny polyester where they were advertised to be a cotton or linen, almost all junk and I had to pay more S&H than I had to pay for the products. I ended up deleting that app. I have received only a couple of items from Temu that didn‚Äôt function and I was able to go in and report the issue and I was given full refund with no need to return the product. My only true problem with Temu is that they are so wonderful that I‚Äôm having trouble with self restraint and I keep putting in orders. üòÅ

title: Do not download.
text: They build a file on you. Like many online companies, Temu tells you that it collects all kinds of information, from your name, phone number, and address to your birthdate, social media photos, and social security number. It also automatically collects data from your phone, tablet, or laptop, information like the operating system, browsing history, and location data. The more information they get, the easier it is to steal their identity, especially with a company tied with China. You don't know where it's going, and the government has issued many warnings over the years. Because once you have all that data, they can use that data to harm the U.S. in some way. This company has an app called pinduoduo that has been banned from Google Play store for containing malware that is put on the user‚Äôs device. This company is also under investigation that they could be using forced labor which would be a good reason as to why their products are so cheap.

title: Expanding Shipping to Other Countries: A Beneficial Move for Temu
text:
Firstly, by expanding your shipping, Temu can reach a wider audience and therefore increase their customer base. This can result in increased revenue for the company, which can be used to fund research and development of new products, as well as improve their current offerings. 

Secondly, by shipping to other countries, Temu can gain valuable insights into different markets and consumer preferences. This can help them tailor their products to better suit the needs of their customers, which can lead to increased customer satisfaction and loyalty. 

Finally, by expanding their shipping, Temu can establish themselves as a global brand, which can lead to increased brand recognition and awareness. This can help them compete with other companies in the same industry, and can also attract potential investors and partners. 

Overall, I think that expanding your shipping to other countries can be a great opportunity for Temu. However, there may be challenges and obstacles to overcome, such as shipping costs, customs regulations, and language barriers. Nonetheless, I believe that if Temu approaches this with a strategic and thoughtful plan, they can successfully expand their shipping and reap the benefits that come with it.

title: Minor flaw‚Ä¶ and Yet please take my review in to consideration and add this feature.
text:
Temu needs to add a reporting option within the app. If an item is missing or damaged during delivery or an item or items never gotten delivered , a help option should be available for customers being able to scroll and go right to and not just having found out months later that hey if I leave a negative review I can then and now be given an option to ask for a refund‚Ä¶ New customers like myself and I‚Äôve just experienced what I just stated shouldn‚Äôt have to go threw the difficulties that I have just to report an issue.

 I love the listings and I truly appreciate the reasonable and affordable prices on a lot of items I‚Äôve seen so far. Stay reasonable and please add a customer service help option within the app.

Great work advertising by the way. Keep up the good work Temu! 2 Thumbs up!
